articles.description:
Our Black Myth: Wukong review hails the game as "a generous Soulsy adventure hybrid that works within its limitations and delivers a beautiful challenge to be unpicked with a magical toolbox". Reviewer Edders went so far as to find the world more engaging than that of Elden Ring - proper defying-the-gods level rhetoric. Players seem to agree. The game launched last night, and has already accrued a concurrent player peak of 1.44 million - Steam's fourth highest ever, exceeded only by Counter-Strike, Palworld and PUBG. By that metric, it's the platform's most popular strictly single player game of all the time.
All that goodwill has been spoiled, however, by a Steam code handout message to streamers and other "content creators" before launch which includes some reactionary, non-binding requests - no mention of "trigger words" like "Covid-19", no talk of "politics" or "feminist propaganda", and no mention of "China's game industry policies, opinions, news, etc". 
 Read more
articles.title: Black Myth: Wukong's record-setting launch popularity soured by co-publisher request to avoid "feminist propaganda" in streams

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Our unlucky planet in Wasteland Waste Disposal has suffered not just one apocalypse but all of them. Turns out the "megapocalypse" was an unhealthy combination of "every worst-case apocalyptic scenario imaginable". Luckily, in this upcoming sandbox adventure, you have a giant metal fortress that walks above the pools of toxic sludge on huge spidery legs and chomps up all the trash you bring it. If you are not intrigued by that, perhaps the little janitor with a sci-fi vacuum cleaner (or the feel-good music reminiscent of Adventure Time songs) will convince you. 
Read more
articles.title: Wasteland Waste Disposal is a cute clean 'em up set in a toxic world (not ours)

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Tactical Breach Wizards is a tactics game for people that don’t like tactics games. Magically, it’s also a tactics game for people who love them like nothing else. It’s permissive and demanding; playful and tense. Its globe-spanning plot covers conspiracies, PMCs, and brutal theocratic dictatorships. It also features a traffic-summoning warlock named Steve wearing a hi-vis robe. It’s finding that one absolutely, perfectly ridiculous XCOM turn, every turn…and at the same time knowing it’s absolutely, perfectly fine if you don’t. In short: it’s one of the most enjoyable tactics games I’ve ever played, and the only tactics game with a pyromancer so rubbish he relies on making his enemies pass out from heatstroke.
Read more
articles.title: Tactical Breach Wizards review: humour, heart, smarts and playfulness conjure up an instant genre classic

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Please lock your Chocobos to attack position and set your Phoenix Downs to stun: Square Enix have released fresh details of Final Fantasy 16's PC port, which has now been dated for launch on 17th September. They've also shared a little about why it's taken so long to arrive - the (generally decent) action-RPG hit PS5 over a year ago, back when I was still some filthy console-playing freelancer.
According to director Hiroshi Takai, it was "impossible" to create the PC and PS5 versions at the same time, even if Square Enix hadn't been restrained by a timed exclusivity clause. He also thinks that the Final Fantasy series faces no "existential risk" right now, despite lower-than-hoped returns from both Final Fantasy 16 and, going by Square Enix's latest financial reports, the more recent and currently PS5-only Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth.
 Read more
articles.title: Final Fantasy faces no "existential risk" despite lower-than-hoped PS5 sales, says FF16 director

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Silent Hill has a messy, up-is-down relationship with time and history, so let's go about this hands-on with the Silent Hill 2 Remake in a messy, up-is-down way. Developed well over two decades ago, the original Silent Hill 2 is the magnum opus of Polish horror stalwarts Bloober Team. Running on then-innovative "Unreal Engine 5" technology created by Jazz Jackrabbit publishers Epic MegaGames, it's a wonderful abyss of a game that remains perfectly playable today, given a certain amount of tolerance for the quirks of the era.
It begins with your character, James Sunderland, descending from the road towards the eponymous Midwestern nowhere-town. Like many games of the period, Silent Hill 2 uses a third-person, over-the-shoulder manual camera, which allows you to glance fearfully up at the monstrous pine trees that fringe the path - each rising from a bulging tide of fog that menaces with the suggestion of approaching figures. There is moisture everywhere, gushing from drain pipes and dribbling down concrete barriers. As you amble into the murk, deathly chords and groaning, unmechanical motifs reverberate from somewhere deep underground. 
 
Read more
articles.title: After three hours of Bloober's Silent Hill 2, it's unclear who is remaking who

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I’ve likely mentioned hitting Lovecraft fatigue so often that it’s now evolved into a second phase of Lovecraft-fatigue fatigue. This is not the same as Lovecraft refreshment, no matter how much I might want to return to the days before old one plushies and Cthulhu children’s books terrorised the internet en masse. There’s not quite enough information about “story generator” sim Marry a Deep One: Innsmouth Simulator for me to confidently say it’ll cut through my exhaustion with all things tentacular and horrifically be-gilled. But it is beguiling, isn’t it? There’s all sorts of little widgets and details shown off that remind me of everything from Sid Meier’s Pirates to classic adventure games, and maybe even a little Rimworld? It’s a heady soup, although one I’d recommend against quaffing, given where the water comes from.
Read more
articles.title: A lovely, not-at-all culty seaside day out awaits in “Story generator” sim Marry a Deep One: Innsmouth Simulator

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
One of the best roguelikes on PC is getting a farewell of sorts this week. Twitchy slashfest Dead Cells received its final major update, introducing new enemies, fresh weapons, and a few mutations. Unfortunately, all this new stuff is very cursed. In other words, it all toys with the game's "curse" status effect, a hex that causes you to be killed if you take even a single hit. You'll probably die a few times as a result of this update, which in some ways is a fitting finalé for this fast-paced jar smasher of a game. You can see the new features in the trailer below. 
Read more
articles.title: Dead Cells gets its final update after 8 years of development, bringing it to a cursed close

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Last week, the Xitter account for H2M - a mod aiming to recreate the heyday of classic Modern Warfare 2 multiplayer inside Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered - announced that they had received a cease and desist from Activision Blizzard, and would shut down the project. The 2022 version of Modern Warfare 2 lacked the original’s multiplayer, and H2M was so highly-anticipated that Steam sales of the 2016 FPS balooned in the lead-up to the mod’s planned release date. It didn't hurt that Activision had it on sale, of course, but the timing lined up so well that some fans speculated the discount was a deliberate bait-and-switch on the publisher’s part to profit from excitement over a mod they were already planning to shut down.
Read more
articles.title: Activision shut down Modern Warfare multiplayer mod H2M to stop it "interfering" with Black Ops 6 sales, says mod maker

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
New week, same old terror of that cyclopean glutton known as the Maw emerging from its cosmic bolthole and swallowing the entirety of Devon. As ever, we have a way of thwarting the Maw's advance, and it's... pasta sauce? Graham, why is there pasta sauce in the Trello? Have Ziff Davis subfranchised us to Dolmio? Oh, I'm sorry! That's just my shopping list. What I meant to say was: new video games! Video games (PC games, specifically) are the only thing that can preoccupy the Maw, the only thing newsworthy enough to distract it from the tempting clifftop maisonettes of Torquay. Let's see what the week has in store for us, eh.
 Read more
articles.title: The Maw: what's new in PC games this week?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
When Bloober and Konami announced that they were remaking Silent Hill 2 as part of a comprehensive series reboot, it made immediate if slightly deflating sense to me. Silent Hill 2 is the more feted of the Hills - if I were a calculating franchise custodian tasked with 'bringing back' one of the acclaimed original trilogy, that's probably the instalment I and my spreadsheets would fix upon. I mean, it's the game with Pyramid Head in it - the nearest thing Silent Hill has to a mascot, and it's not like there's an issue of cutting out plot material: each game in the Silent Hill series is, on some level, a distinct story with a distinct protagonist.
Still, the decision to 'skip' the first game in the series, whose world, narrative themes, music and art direction set the parameters for all the rest, made my brain itch a bit, and when I ran into Bloober's creative director Mateusz Lenart and lead producer Maciej Głomb at a Konami event, I had to ask about it. 
 
Read more
articles.title: Why didn't Silent Hill 2 Remake studio Bloober start by remaking Silent Hill 1? The devs explain

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Hello reader who is also a reader, and welcome back to Booked For The Week - our regular Sunday chat with a selection of cool industry folks about books! You know books, right? They’re like RPS articles, but slightly better for piling under a flock mat to make little hills for your plastic spacemen. Fitting, then, that this week it’s plastic spaceman enthusiast, writer on Absolver, Nightingale, Gladius, and Total War: Warhammer 3, and Ten Things Video Games Can Teach Us author, Dan Griliopoulos! Cheers Dan! Mind if we have a nose at your bookshelf?
Read more
articles.title: What's on your bookshelf?: Nightingale, Absolver, and Total War: Warhammer writer Dan Griliopoulos

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Sundays are for cat. I’m currently in the process of acquiring a gorgeous white and ginger kitten for the local shelter. I have seen four seconds of footage and I’m already smitten, kitten. Before I spend the weekend getting very excited about big stretches, let’s read this week’s best writing about games (and game related things!)
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
JDM: Rise Of The Scorpion is a free prologue for JDM: Japanese Drift Master, a racing game about - who could guess - drift racing in Japan. It's got an open world set in rural towns to burn rubber around as well as several story missions to play. You can download it from Steam now.

 
Read more
articles.title: JDM: Rise Of The Scorpion offers a free prologue of drift racing around rural Japan

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I've got a real soft spot for Trombone Champ, a rhythm game about tooting along to music that works perfectly with the mouse. I'm also a huge fan of Beat Saber, a rhythm game in which you slice at blocks that whizz towards you in VR.

You can see where this is going. Trombone Champ: Unflattened transports that 2022 tooting into 2024 virtual reality.

 
Read more
articles.title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened brings the tooting simulator to virtual reality this autumn

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vrtal mi hlavou tripple buffering v KDE i GNOME a jeho vliv na plynulost desktopu se starými CPU+GPU Intel. Nakonec mě toto téma dovedlo k přesvědčení, které shrnuje název dnešního povídání.
articles.title: Čtyřjádrový procesor už na linuxový desktop přestává stačit

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Budeme se zabývat důležitou problematikou, konkrétně jak vybrat co nejvhodnější model, jak nastavit hyperparametry modelů a jak vlastně zjistit, které atributy se mají použít při tréninku modelu.
articles.title: Křížová validace modelů v knihovně scikit-learn

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Karel Burda)
articles.description: Článek se věnuje ohrožení kryptografie kvantovými počítači. Je v něm vysvětlena bezpečnost kryptosystémů, možnosti kvantových počítačů a uvedeny nové kryptosystémy odolné vůči útokům kvantovými počítači.
articles.title: Kvantové počítače zatím kryptografii neohrožují, nové algoritmy ale vznikají

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si vyzkoušíme zajímavý webový prohlížeč, vyzkoušíme aplikaci pro sdílení souborů přes místní síť, necháme si zobrazit oznámení z GitHubu na ploše a přeložíme si pár textů.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (28. 8. 2024): sdílejte soubory pohodlně po místní síti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V dnešním článku dokončíme popis programování karty VGA. Ukážeme si především způsob nakonfigurování slavného režimu X a ve druhé části si vysvětlíme jednu z možností modularizace aplikací psaných v assembleru.
articles.title: Grafická karta VGA a slavný režim X (X-mode)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: V dnešnom diele Postrehov sa pozrieme na stále aktívne zneužívanú zraniteľnosť v Jenkins, prehlásenie k e-shop aplikáciám od NÚKIB a ÚOOÚ, zraniteľnosti v Microsoft Outlook a Slack AI a ďalšie zaujímavosti.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: CISA varuje pred Jenkins RCE a prehlásenie NÚKIB

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Ubuntu 24.10 „Oracular Oriole“ bude mít nostalgický mód jako oslavu dvacátého výročí prvního vydání. Haiku vylepšuje výkon a portuje prohlížeč Firefox. Minimalistický operační systém MenuetOS dostal základní X server.
articles.title: Nostalgie v Ubuntu 24.10, Haiku vylepšuje výkon

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE ve znamení zlepšování použitelnosti, vydání nové verz balíku KDE Gear 24.08, vývojová verze Wine 9.16 opravuje 25 chyb.
articles.title: Google o procesu přechodu z 4kB na 16kB stránky u Androidu, Mozilla Whisperfile na bázi OpenAI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nové funkce v Calcu,lepší podpora OOXML, vylepšené rozhraní Impressu jsou některé z novinek letní verze kancelářského balíku LibreOffice 24.8. Co dalšího pro nás vývojáři připravili?
articles.title: LibreOffice 24.8 se loučí s Windows 7 a 8, vylepšuje podporu GTK

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dokončíme popis problematiky modelů provádějících regresní analýzu. Ukážeme si, jak tyto modely natrénovat, jak zjistit, které atributy způsobují špatné předpovědi modelu i to, jak zjistit atributy způsobující nestabilitu předpovědí.
articles.title: Balíček scikit-learn: trénink a předpovědi modelů provádějících regresní analýzu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Adam)
articles.description: MikroTik na svém youtubovém kanále a na fóru oznámil první veřejnou betaverzi administrační aplikace pro routery WinBox 4. Aplikace je určená pro konfiguraci routerů a switchů se systémem RouterOS. Hlavní novinkou je především nativní podpora UI pro systémy Windows, Linux a macOS, na kterou se dle článku na fóru čekalo 15 let.
articles.title: MikroTik oznámil betaverzi konfiguračního nástroje WinBox verze 4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V Epic Store je možné zdarma získat Fallout Classic Collection, což je Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics.
articles.title: Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics zdarma v Epic Store

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Mirko Pavleski ze Severní Makedonie minulý týden zveřejnil návod, jak vyrobit jednoduché a levné internetové rádio s ESP32.  Použije k tomu CrowPanel 2.8"-ESP32 HMI 320×240, což je dotyková obrazovka s ESP32 v ceně asi 15 dolarů. K tomu Li-pol baterii, reproduktor a vypínač a to je všechno.
articles.title: Internetové rádio s ESP32 a Yoradio

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Před pěti lety Microsoft vydal písmo Cascadia Code pod licencí Open Font, které je určeno pro terminál nebo editory kódu. Používá jej také Windows Terminal. Nyní pokračuje s dalším vylepšováním písma a ve středu zveřejnil font Cascadia Next.
articles.title: Microsoft připravuje písmo Cascadia Next

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM. Kromě menší paměti a ceny má také SoC Broadcom BCM2712 s označením D0. Ten by měl mít odstraněny nepotřebné věci.
articles.title: Nové Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM má o 0,8–0,9 W menší spotřebu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: asdf.root)
articles.description: Polská společnost Teonite vyvinula open-source aplikaci Defguard postavenou na WireGuardu s implementací MFA/2FA včetně podpory YubiKey. Další výhodou je možnost napojení na LDAP a podpora SSO.
articles.title: Defguard: WireGuard s podporou MFA/2FA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Včera, po mírném zpoždění, vyšlo Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, včetně všech oficiálních variant Kubuntu, Ubuntu Budgie, Ubuntu MATE, Lubuntu , Ubuntu Kylin, Ubuntu Studio, Xubuntu, Edubuntu , Ubuntu Cinnamon a Ubuntu Unity. Detaily naleznete v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Vyšlo Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, uživatelé 22.04 mohou aktualizovat

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na YouTube se již před čtyřmi roky objevilo zvláštní video, které má pomoci odstraní vodu z mobilního telefonu. Pokud vám spadne telefon do vody, tak prý stačí přehrát na největší hlasitost dvouminutové video s nízkými tóny a voda se dostane ven, obzvláště okolo reproduktorů.
articles.title: Video na YouTube odstraní vodu z mobilního telefonu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Získejte obecný přehled o současných technikách strojového učení a naučte se programovat základní řešení ML pomocí open-source knihoven Sciki-Learn a TensorFlow v jazyce Python. Absolvujte ucelenou pětidenní sérii workshopů strojového učení, kde nejsou potřeba žádné předchozí znalosti umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Bootcamp strojového učení: praktické aplikace z oblastí zpracování obrazu, textu a časových řad (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Stát společně s operátory a provozovatelé klíčových internetových infrastruktur podepsali dokument nazvaný Společná deklarace o spolupráci a podpoře rozšiřování protokolu IPv6 v České republice [PDF]. V něm vyjadřují vzájemnou dohodu o spolupráci na rozšiřování internetového protokolu verze 6 (IPv6) v České republice s cílem naplnění usnesení vlády České republiky č. 49 ze dne 17. ledna 2024 k restartu zavádění technologie DNSSEC a protokolu IPv6 ve státní správě.
articles.title: Stát, operátoři a provozovatelé infrastruktur podepsali deklaraci o nasazení IPv6

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Google více než zdvojnásobila odměnu za odhalení bezpečnostní chyby v prohlížeči Google Chrome nahlášené v rámci svého programu odměn za zranitelnosti. Možná odměna za jednu chybu nyní dosahuje výše 250 000 dolarů, tedy přibližně na pět a půl milionu korun.
articles.title: Google zvyšuje odměnu za nalezení chyby v prohlížeči Chrome až na 250 000 dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři komunikačního nástroje Pidgin odstranili zásuvný modul ScreenShareOTR ze svého oficiálního seznamu doplňků třetích stran poté, co bylo zjištěno, že slouží k instalaci keyloggerů, programů pro krádež informací a malwaru, který se běžně používá k získání přístupu do firemních sítí.
articles.title: Pidgin odhalil malware ve svém repozitáři s doplňky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tvůrce a šéf komunikační služby Telegram, Pavel Durov, byl po třech dnech ve vazbě propuštěn na svobodu. Musel ovšem složit kauci ve výši pěti milionů eur, nesmí opustit Francii a musí se dvakrát týdne hlásit policii.
articles.title: Pavel Durov byl propuštěn na kauci, bylo mu sděleno obvinění a nesmí opustit Francii

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili Wireshark 4.4, který nově podporuje automatické přepínání profilů, takže filtry zobrazení lze přiřadit ke konfiguraci, na kterou se pak nástroj automaticky přepne při otevření souboru se zachycením odpovídajícím danému filtru.
articles.title: Wireshark 4.4 nabízí automatické přepínání profilů a nové protokoly

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Terminálový multiplexer GNU Screen se dočkal nové verze 5.0. Pokud tuto užitečnou utilitu neznáte, doporučujeme přečíst článek Screen: ještě mocnější terminál. Nástroj umožňuje rozdělit obrazovku na virtuální terminály a obsluhovat tak najednou několik běžících procesů.
articles.title: Vyšel GNU Screen 5.0 s novým autentizačním mechanismem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Sdružení CZ.NIC oznamuje ukončení podpory starší verze protokolu OpenID 2.0. Jak uvádí Jaromír Talíř na blogu CZ.NIC: „Když se MojeID v roce 2015 poprvé začalo připravovat na využití jako oficiální identita pro občany České republiky a došlo k zapojení do pilotního projektu přeshraniční identifikace STORK, muselo se MojeID přeci jen naučit protokol SAML 2.0. V té době již také došlo ke standardizaci OpenID Connect a jak jste se mohli dočíst na našem blogu, MojeID se tak rychle stalo službou, ke které je možné se připojit libovolným z těchto protokolů. Protokol OpenID 2.0 nicméně má svoje nejlepší léta za sebou a proto padlo rozhodnutí jeho podporu ukončit.“
articles.title: Konec podpory OpenID 2.0 v MojeID nastane 31. března 2025

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: LinkedIn na svých serverech přešel z CentOS na vlastní Azure Linux (dříve CBL-Mariner), vyvíjený Microsoftem. Nemělo by jít o zásadní překvapení, kolem CentOS se od oznámení konce „klasické“ verze 7 událo mnoho věcí (mimo jiné LinkedIn zmiňuje změny kolem CentOS 8), které LinkedIn nemusí vyhovovat, když navíc pod křídly vlastní mateřské firmy mají k dispozici neméně tak slušný systém, nasazený na spoustě firemních serverů.
articles.title: LinkedIn přešel z CentOS na Azure Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ač nepochybně následníka KOffice, kancelářský balík Calligra, používá podstatně méně uživatelů než LibreOffice, vývoj nadále probíhá. Čerstvé vydání verze 4.0 přináší upravené uživatelské rozhraní a zejména portaci na Qt6.
articles.title: KDE Calligra Office 4.0 má vylepšené Qt6 rozhraní

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Projekt Mono, který kdysi začal Miguel de Icaza s kolegy jako otevřenou implementaci přinášející (nejen) na Linux C#/.NET, se přesouvá od Microsoftu pod křídla Wine a jeho vývojářské komunity. Jak konstatuje Phoronix, je tomu 5 let od chvíle, kdy vyšla poslední verze Mono a je logické, že ve vývoji dále bude pokračovat WineHQ, která v rámci Wine stále více a více Mono využívá a implementuje.
articles.title: Microsoft předal projekt Mono pod křídla Wine

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V rámci Vulkan ovladače pro Radeony, tedy RADV z projektu Mesa, je nově k dispozici kód, který se objeví v Mesa 24.3 a který aktivuje podporu využívání hardwarové akcelreace kódování a dekódování videa skrze univerzální rozhraní Vulkan Video. Konkrétně jde o aktivaci podpory pro Radeony s GPU architekturou RDNA3 a video enginem VCN4, tedy generaci známou též jako Navi 3×, resp. Radeon RX 7000. Zkrátka poslední generaci Radeonů.
articles.title: Mesa 24.3 přinese Vulkan Video i pro nejnovější Radeony

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Godot 4.3 přinesl řadu skvělých novinek, ale tvůrci o týden později dodávají, že v kódu projektu se už předtím nashromáždilo dost novinek, které jsou vysoké kvality implementace, jen nechtěli riskovat jejich začlenění do čtyři-trojky. A tak první vývojové sestavení příštího Godotu 4.4 přináší další důležitá vylepšení kvality tohoto herního 3D enginu.
articles.title: Godot 4.4 dev1 s interpolací 3D fyziky či renderingem přes API Metal

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Sovereign Tech Fund, který kromě jiného podporuje spousty dalších open-source projektů, schválil obří investici do FreeBSD. Oblíbený operační systém obdrží 686 400 eur, zejména na vylepšení v oblastech, kde již za Linuxem zaostává.
articles.title: Německý státní fond investuje téměř 700 tisíc eur do FreeBSD

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na serveru GOG.com je možné zdarma získat hru Tropico 4 zdarma. Jde o čtvrtý díl oblíbené série simulací. Ve hře jste El Presidente na jednom karibském ostrově v období studené války.
articles.title: Tropico 4 zdarma na GOG.com

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Codon je rychlá implementace Pythonu, která se snaží o rychlosti srovnatelné s nativním kódem v C/C++. V jednom vlákně je často 10–100× rychlejší než referenční  CPython. Navíc nativně používá multithreading.
articles.title: Codon: 10–100× rychlejší Python

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Hongkongská firma DeepComputing, specializující se na RISC-V, minulý týden oznámila tablet DC-ROMA RISC-V Pad II určený k nativnímu vývoji aplikací pro RISC-V. Obrazovka má diagonálu 10,1 palce a rozlišení 1920×1200. Operační paměť LPDDR4 může mít 4, 8 a 16 GB. eMMC 5.1 pak 64 nebo 128 GB.
articles.title: Tablet DC-ROMA RISC-V Pad II od 3300 korun

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 35/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Acronis představuje novou verzi Acronis True Image na českém trhu. Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %. Vědci vyvinuli metodu detekce jednoatomových defektů v polovodičích. Každá pátá firma zasažena útoky na dodavatelský řetězec hardwaru. České firmy platí po útoků ransomwarem výkupné i 6 milionů Kč.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Navrhují hledat temnou hmotu v neutronových hvězdách. Nová analýza dat z Webbova dalekohledu ukazuje, že s Hubbleovou konstantou nemusí být problém.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Nitridy uhlíku mohou konkurovat diamantu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 34/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V letních měsících byly vydány aktualizace openSUSE Leap a SUSE, FreeBSD, Debianu, na testování zabezpečení zaměřených distribucí Kali a Parrot, dále např. IPFire, EasyOS, Tails či EndeavourOS.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 23-26/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: AI působí jako katalyzátor ransomwarových útoků, ale i jako jejich brzda. Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě. Westcom 3D LAB demonstruje možnosti integrace bezpečnostních řešení více dodavatelů. Velké jazykové modely by mohly samy pro sebe generovat programy. A k čemu to může být dobré? Povede umělá inteligence k modernizaci finančních služeb?
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 33/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nový model umělé inteligence odhaluje skrytý jazyk DNA. Antropický princip a problém srovnávání nekonečen. Čeští vědci jako první viděli 3D strukturu organického materiálu staršího než Země.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Gravitační vlny by dokázaly prozradit používání warpových pohonů

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Ať už horečně hledáte levnou cestu k postavení hového počítače, nebo jen chcete upgradovat stárnoucí kopii Office, tato kolekce nabídky od Goodoffer24.com vám pomůže. Jejich ceny jsou opravdu neuvěřitelné, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Oficiální cena za Windows 11 Pro je €259 avšak Goodoffer24 účtuje jen €20

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled červencových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za červenec 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Řízení rizik může zpomalovat inovace, včetně zavádění AI. Konica Minolta se zaměřila na ochranu firemních dat. Teplotu elektroniky by mohly měřit neutrony, přesně a rychle. Nekonečně velká ochrana stojí nekonečně velké peníze. Průzkum Acronis hlásí 293% nárůst e-mailových útoků.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Teplotu elektroniky by mohly měřit neutrony, přesně a rychle

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Dnes končí konference European GNU Radio Days 2024 věnovaná open source SDR (softwarově definované rádio). Videozáznamy přednášek jsou postupně zveřejňovány na YouTube. Pro nedočkavce jsou k dispozici nesestříhané streamy.
articles.title: Videozáznamy přednášek z European GNU Radio Days 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývojáři EmuDeck, tj. projektu jehož cílem je usnadnění emulací na SteamOS, spustili na Indiegogo kampaň na podporu vývoje retro herních konzolí EmuDeck Machines s předinstalovanou linuxovou distribucí Bazzite vycházející z Fedora Atomic Desktops.
articles.title: EmuDeck Machines

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Online magazín věnovaný počítačovému hardwaru AnandTech po 27 letech skončil. Začal (3. dubna 1997 - AMD K6) a skončil (14. srpna 2024 - AMD Ryzen 9 9950X a 9900X) recenzí procesorů AMD.
articles.title: AnandTech po 27 letech skončil

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: GNUnet (Wikipedie) byl vydán v nové major verzi 0.22.0. Jedná se o framework pro decentralizované peer-to-peer síťování, na kterém je postavena řada aplikací.
articles.title: GNUnet 0.22.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Grafana (Wikipedie), tj. open source nástroj pro vizualizaci různých metrik a s ní související dotazování, upozorňování a lepší porozumění, byla vydána ve verzi 11.2. Přehled novinek v aktualizované dokumentaci.
articles.title: Grafana 11.2

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Po CZC.cz sa na Allegro přesouvá také Mall.cz.
articles.title: Po CZC.cz sa na Allegro přesouvá také Mall.cz

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 6.9 webového prohlížeče Vivaldi (Wikipedie). Postavena je na Chromiu 128. Přehled novinek i s náhledy v příspěvku na blogu. Oficiálně je k dispozici Vivaldi pro Windows na Arm.
articles.title: Vivaldi 6.9

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: V roce 2021 přešly projekty Elasticsearch a Kibana z licence Apache 2.0 na duální licencování pod Server Side Public License (SSPL) a vlastní source-available Elastic License (EL). Přestalo se tak jednat o open source. Společnost AWS (Amazon Web Services) na to reagovala open source forkem OpenSearch. Po třech letech budou Elasticsearch a Kibana opět open source. Vedle SSPL a EL budou zdrojové kódy k dispozici také pod open source licencí AGPL.
articles.title: Elasticsearch a Kibana opět open source

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Bylo vydáno Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, tj. první opravné vydání Ubuntu 24.04 LTS s kódovým názvem Noble Numbat. Přehled novinek a oprav na Discourse.
articles.title: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Poslední možnost přihlásit přednášku nebo workshop (Linux, open source, sítě, bezpečnost, vývoj a podobně) na konferenci LinuxDays 2024, která proběhne o víkendu 12. a 13. října v Praze. Vstup na konferenci je zdarma.
articles.title: Poslední možnost přihlásit přednášku nebo workshop na konferenci LinuxDays 2024

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Rust-based, open-source Servo web engine had a very eventful month as the developers involved continue advancing this browser engine as well as their example/reference web browser...
articles.title: Servo Browser Now Supports Tabbed Browsing, WAV Audio Files

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: This week's batch of power management fixes for the Linux 6.11 kernel are just a set of three patches for AMD processors...
articles.title: AMD Preferred Core Fix Lands Ahead Of Linux 6.11-rc6

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: A new AVX2 code path for FFmpeg's VVC decoding "vvcdec" is helping provide significant speed-ups for CPU-based H.266 decoding...
articles.title: New AVX2 Code Helps FFmpeg With VVC Decoding Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Jonas Ådahl released Wayland-Protocols 1.37 as the newest update to this defined set of Wayland protocols. With the new release there are three new protocols added plus various other maintenance items addressed within the Wayland-Protocols repository...
articles.title: Wayland Protocols 1.37 Introduces Three New Protocols

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Plasma 6.2 this week entered its soft feature freeze ahead of the Plasma 6.2 stable release in October. The focus now is on bug-fixing for Plasma 6.2 and at the moment they are at 301 bug reports, which is their lowest amount going back to 2015. The KDE developers hope over the next month to drop that to less than 200 bug reports...
articles.title: KDE Desktop Will Remind You Yearly For Donations, Other Changes For Plasma 6.2

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the pull request from earlier this week that enables Intel Xe2 Lunar Lake and Battlemage graphics by default for Linux 6.12, a final set of feature updates for the Intel kernel graphics driver have been submitted ahead of this next kernel cycle...
articles.title: Intel Battlemage Battles More Linux 6.12 Kernel Graphics Driver Changes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following last week's Vulkan 1.3.294 with pipeline binary extension, Vulkan 1.3.295 is out today and it too introduces a prominent new extension...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.3.295 Released With Compute Shader Derivatives Extension

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Microsoft engineers continue contributing to the open-source Mesa graphics driver code for benefiting Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) usage and other related use atop Windows 11. The latest contribution to Mesa is wiring up direct DPB management for the D3D12 video acceleration code...
articles.title: Microsoft Further Improves D3D12 Video Acceleration In Mesa

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While all of the focus recently when it comes to Intel's open-source Linux graphics driver has been around getting Lunar Lake and Battlemage graphics ready, there is an important last-minute fix that is also needed for ensuring Arrow Lake graphics support is ready for Linux users...
articles.title: Important Linux Patch Arriving For Intel Arrow Lake Graphics

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Longtime Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) subsystem maintainer David Airlie of Red Hat has written an interesting blog post providing an analogy to types of developers compared to road builders and hotels...
articles.title: Rust Linux Developers Compared To Road Builders & Mapmakers

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Wine project has released VKD3D 1.13 as the newest version of this open-source code for mapping Microsoft's Direct3D 12 API atop the Vulkan API for helping to accelerate Windows games and applications on Linux...
articles.title: VKD3D 1.13 Improves Direct3D 12 API Support Atop Vulkan

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Even before the Bcachefs file-system driver was accepted into the mainline kernel, Debian for the past five years has offered a "bcachefs-tools" package to provide the user-space programs to this copy-on-write file-system. It was simple at first when it was simple C code but since the Bcachefs tools transitioned to Rust, it's become an unmaintainable mess for stable-minded distribution vendors. As such the bcachefs-tools package has now been orphaned by Debian...
articles.title: Debian Orphans Bcachefs-Tools: "Impossible To Maintain In Debian Stable"

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS has been released as the first point release of the current Long Term Support series that began in April with the "Noble Numbat" debut...
articles.title: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS Released With All Stable Release Updates Included

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Submitted today via DRM-Misc-Next to DRM-Next for staging ahead of the Linux 6.12 merge window in mid-September is optional support for displaying a QR code within the DRM Panic handler infrastructure when a Linux kernel panic occurs...
articles.title: Linux 6.12 To Optionally Display A QR Code During Kernel Panics

articles.author: Michael Larabel

These games took very separate paths, including diverging questlines. Some quests were exclusive to RuneScape 3, while others were made just for OSRS. Over the years, Old School RuneScape has looked to RS3 for inspiration several times, occasionally bringing over quests still worth doing.


The most recent example is 'While Guthix Sleeps', which debuted in Old School RuneScape in July 2024, 16 years after its RS3 release. But which quests remain in the newer RS that should still m…

The biggest difference between the two games is their setting, with the first on a Forge World being invaded by Orks, and the second on a much more vibrant planet that's under threat from a Tyranid invasion. articles.author: Xavier Smith
articles.description:
The Dark Lord from Castlevania is the fog's most diverse killer in Dead by Daylight. Dracula is a killer that can shapeshift into several forms, each tailored to effectively hunt survivors. Here is how to counter Dracula in Dead by Daylight.


Image via Behaviour Interactive


Dracula has three forms he can switch between on the fly. Only his Vampire and Wolf form are capable of attacking, while his Bat form is used primarily to quickly cover ground. The general strategy for dealing with Dracula is to keep running. Both his Wolf and Vampire form have anti-looping abilities that easily catch survivors who run straight for pallets and windows.


How to counter Vampire form


In Vampire form, Dracula can use the Hellfire spell to shoot out seven flame pillars in a straight line. You can dodge this attack by making quick, sharp turns away from Dracula's line of sight. When he's charging or canceling the Hellfire spell, Dracula's speed is decreased drastically, so you can also use this time to run.


How to counter Wolf form


With Wolf form, Dracula can charge two Pounces to quickly leap forward and attack. Similar to the Hellfire spell, Dracula will slow down when charging a pounce, so you know to dodge when he begins to slow down. To avoid a Pounce, hug the walls in a loop and continue running. If Dracula Pounces into an object, it'll trigger a lengthy animation, buying you some time.


How to counter Bat form


Bat form gives Dracula the Undetectable status effect, a hefty speed boost, and the ability to teleport to vault points within 32 meters. Dracula can't attack in this form or see survivors so he'll need to rely on scratch marks, pools of blood, and noise to track survivors. You can throw Dracula off your trail by running in one direction, then walking back the way you came. If Dracula is close, you can run straight through him as he has no collision in Bat form.

The post How to counter Dracula in Dead by Daylight appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to counter Dracula in Dead by Daylight

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Rice cocoons are an important resource in Chen Loong’s quest in Black Myth: Wukong. They are needed to feed the growing worm in the Zodiac Village, so here’s what you need to know how to farm them up.


Where to find rice cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong


To find rice cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong, you need to destroy all the cocoons that are around the Webbed Hollow area. Unfortunately, there aren’t any guarantees that you’ll find all three rather quickly. 


It’s not a designated drop either from any particular enemy. You just have to keep destroying these cocoons and hope that RNG blesses you with good luck. So, while you’re traversing through the Webbed Hollow, try destroying every or most cocoon you see on the ground.


You should also try destroying the larger cocoons that start moving and eventually hatch into a Lesser Yaoguai. Once they break out of them and become normal enemies, they will not drop this resource.


If you want a place to somewhat farm cocoons, it’s best to use the area by the Bonevault. This is near where you’d meet the Horse Guai for the fourth time if you followed his quest.


There are a lot of eggs between the shrine and getting to that area. Once you destroy as many eggs as you find in your path, use your Incense Trail Talisman to teleport back to the shrine and repeat it.


Screenshot by Destructoid


What to do with rice cocoons


Once you have all three rice cocoons, you will take them to Chen Loong, the seed trader NPC at the Zodiac Village. There’s a vessel housing a small Armourworm just by the rest of the crops. 


You can only feed it one at a time, meaning that once you give one cocoon, you have to go back to the Shrine and do it again. After the third time, you’ll receive the Elder Armourworm Spirit to use and cultivate.

The post Where to find rice cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find rice cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong

Once you’ve gotten to the Upper Pagoda shrine, turn around and drop down a hole in the floor. Fight and defeat Ca…

Sure, every so often he would vanish and reappear on the other side of the arena, but aside from that he didn’t seem to have many tricks. Then Yellowbrow trapped me inside a magic sack and transformed me from a monkey into a smaller, wilder monkey, and everything went off the rails. 


The real Yellowbrow boss fight happens after that transformation. First the Destined One needs…
articles.title: How to beat Yellowbrow in Black Myth: Wukong

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Black Ops 6 beta revolutionizes classic loadouts with the introduction of the convenient Dedicated Melee system. This innovative mechanic makes it a breeze to wield your tools, permitting you to use them at any moment. We'll show you how to use a Melee weapon in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta to guide you through this new tactic.


Black Ops 6 beta Dedicated Melee guide


In Black Ops 6 beta, you can equip your Melee weapon by holding the 'Melee' button. This differs from past entries like Modern Warfare 3, where Melees usually occupied the Secondary Weapon section. With the beta, a third slot is now designated for the more compact weapons, giving you a total of three tools in your arsenal.


Screenshot by Destructoid


If you've performed Finishing Moves in the past, the Melee interaction utilizes the same button and process. The only difference is that Finishing Moves requires an enemy Operator close by, similar to the returning Body Shield feature. So, as long as nobody is around you, you can freely equip your Melee weapon. You'll also activate unlimited Tac Sprint while holding this tool, allowing you to travel more efficiently.


Keep in mind that the standard 'Switch Weapon' interaction does not work for Melee weapons. However, you can use it to swap out your knives for your Primary and Secondary.


While the Black Ops 6 beta currently offers a limited selection of tools, with the knife being the sole tool in the Melee category, there's a lot to look forward to. The upcoming Weekend Two and the official launch are sure to bring more weapons, diversifying the collection and enhancing your gameplay.  

The post How to use Melee weapon in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to use Melee weapon in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
The Treasure Hunter quest is one of the more important side quests in Black Myth: Wukong. It’s required if you want to get the secret ending of the game alongside clearing all the secret areas.


With all that said, here’s how you can start it and what you need to do to complete it.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to start the Treasure Hunter quest in Black Myth: Wukong


The quest will first start once you reach the Bitter Lake area in Chapter 3. Find the North Shore of the Bitter Lake Shrine as the main starting point. Go back from where you found the shrine to end up at a red gate.


Go through this gate and proceed on this trail until you run into another building at a fork in the road. The Treasure Hunter should be sitting right there. After clearing the enemies, you can talk to him. As always, exhaust his dialogue to progress.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to complete the Treasure Hunter quest


Progress onward through the chapter up until you reach the Towers of Karma Shrine in the Valley of Ecstasy. Here, you should already have the Ring of Fire ability at this time. 


You’ll find the Treasure Hunter again, telling you that he’s cold. It’s implied that you need to use the Ring of Fire ability near him to warm him up. In doing so, you’ll get a new cutscene followed by some dialogue.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You have to get to the Melon Field to complete this quest. We have a whole guide on how to get there from this area, which you can check out here.


The closest shrine to get there is the one in the Forest of Felicity. Staying on the initial right path, then hugging the left side of the path from there will eventually take you there.


In the end, you will have to fight a boss to initiate the last cut scene of the quest, but then you’ll also be given the Spell Binder ability.

The post How to complete the Treasure Hunter quest in Black Myth: Wukong appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to complete the Treasure Hunter quest in Black Myth: Wukong

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
If you’re up for trying out the new Club Challenge, you’ll need to jump into the FC Mobile 25 Beta before it wraps up on September 12, 2024. 


The beta’s got a cool new orange look and some gameplay changes to keep things interesting. This article will fill you in on the Club Challenge details and several changes that we can see in FC Mobile 25 Beta.


What is Club Challenge in FC Mobile 25 Beta?


Image via EA Sports


Club Challenge is the new PvP tournament mode in FC Mobile 25 Beta where you can play a H2H match with the LaLiga clubs. Plus, it features a new broadcast package that has new commentary, stadium dressings, podiums, trophies, and much more.


The challenge has three rounds, and you get 10 retries for each match. Plus, there are rewards for each round. Check out what you can win:



Round one: Coin x 100,000


Round two: Coin x 100,000


Round three: Coin x200,000



Keep in mind, though, that you can only log in with a guest account in the FC Mobile 25 Beta. Any progress or rewards you earn won’t transfer to the main game.


What are the gameplay changes in FC Mobile 25 Beta?



If you are a hardcore player in FC Mobile, then you have realized that the AI difficulty in high-tier matches is very low, and in FC Mobile 25 Beta, the AI difficulty is enhanced so that you can equal competition in high-tier matches.


It also fixed an issue in Manager Mode where some of your through passes overshoot their target.


The post FC Mobile 25 Beta: Club Challenge and gameplay changes appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: FC Mobile 25 Beta: Club Challenge and gameplay changes

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Are you feeling trusting? Interested in getting Guilty Gear Strive on Switch. Arc System Works has a deal for you. If you preorder the physical addition from their online store, you can get a “Free Mystery Gift” bundled in.


I’m honestly not sure how “free” it is since it comes up for me at $83, which is more than Switch games typically go for, even when converted to Canadian Loonies. That sounds like you’re paying something to get it, which means it isn’t free. Maybe that’s just weirdness with regional pricing. However, the store page does say that it has a value of $29.98. That kind of puts it in keychain territory.


But maybe it’s not a keychain. Maybe it’s something way cooler like a hat pin. Maybe it’s Guilty Gear Strive on PS4. Maybe they’re bundling in one of the DLC seasons. Maybe it’s literally just $29.98 in cash. It could be anything worth $29.98, and value is in the wallet of the beholder. Our boy Eric Van Allen is brave enough to find out. Are you?


I love Guilty Gear Strive. I can’t play it for too long at the time because the opening dialogue that says “Mankind knew they cannot change society. So instead of reflecting on themselves, they blamed the Beasts” every fucking fight wears on me. I don’t want to skip the introduction, but I also don’t want to listen to that pseudointellectual prose every fight. What was wrong with just “Heaven or Hell?” Couldn’t they just say it once and be done with it?


What were we talking about? Oh, right. Currently, I’ve only been able to find the mystery gift deal on the official Arc System Works Gear store. It’s available for preorder right now and will ship when the game releases January 23, 2025.

The post You can preorder Guilty Gear Strive on the Arc Store and get a “Free Mystery Gift” appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: You can preorder Guilty Gear Strive on the Arc Store and get a “Free Mystery Gift”

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Atlus recently brought on Nier developer Yoko Taro (spotted by Automaton, who also drew attention to the key quote) to promote their upcoming Metaphor ReFantazio. While Yoko Taro is not generally associated with Atlus (or Sega), he was very enthusiastic about the new game, stating, “It’s so stylish, I almost wet myself.”


We’ve all been there; playing a game so captivating that our weakened bladders give out. Sometimes, not enough to breach the silk of our underpants, but other times so voluminous that a replacement couch must be brought in immediately (I assume most people keep a spare on hand for emergencies). In this case, it was the UI that Taro found so pant-soakingly amazing. Who doesn’t appreciate a good typeface? The first time I saw Microsoft Word’s Wordart, I nearly died of dehydration.




Taro stresses that he was neither incentivized nor under duress when he gave his opinion. He says he’s a fan of Atlas and later clarifies, “Oh, I didn’t get any money for this! I’m just a middle-aged dude who showed up,” he said. Much of the video posted on YouTube is just tomfoolery – the best type of foolery – alongside voice actress Tomomi Isomura. He spends a good amount of time talking about Nier. Admittedly, it gets pretty bizarre. Eventually, it’s just his mask on a box that he’s voicing over. Really on brand for Yoko Taro.


Metaphor Refantazio looks like a good time. I don’t think I’ll actually play it because it’s likely going to be a jillion hours long. I don’t have time for that these days. Unless the bosses here asked me to cover it and gave me, like, a week off to play it. Then I’d play it. And they should totally do that.


Metaphor Refantazio releases October 11, 2024 and will be available for PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

The post Yoko Taro says Metaphor ReFantazio is “so stylish, I almost wet myself” appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Yoko Taro says Metaphor ReFantazio is “so stylish, I almost wet myself”

articles.description:
Black Ops Cold War's Body Shield returns in Black Ops 6, allowing you to give a nice hug to your opponents. The tactic offers many advantages by safely guarding you from enemy gunfire. We'll show you how to use Body Shield in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta.


How to perform Body Shield in Black Ops 6 beta


To use Body Shield in Black Ops 6 beta, sneak up behind an enemy and double-tap the Melee button. The interaction appears when you're close to the opponent, which will also display a prompt for a Finishing Move (holding the button instead). It'll be tricky to do with all the chaos going around, so it may take a few tries to master.


Screenshot by Destructoid


I find it best to perform the Body Shield while holding a Melee weapon, as it helps you move around faster. Some maps also have more hiding spots for you to use, including the train yard in Derelict. Then, once you complete it, you'll temporarily gain control of the opponent with the free range to move around. Look out for the meter at the center of the screen to determine how long the shield will last. It goes by quickly, and the "victim" can even call for help to cut it short. Just try to take advantage of the shield while you can and shoot down anyone in your way.


Screenshot by Destructoid


When the Body Shield victim has done their part, you'll have the option to Quick Kill or Execute (Finishing Move) them. But if you want to keep the fun going, you can use voice chat with them to whisper some sweet nothings in their ears. 

The post How to use Body Shield in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to use Body Shield in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
FC Mobile 25 Beta is here, and players are already joining the beta test to try out the new features. As of now, EA has revealed a new PvP tournament game mode called “Club Challenge,” where you can dive into head-to-head matches with LaLiga EA Sports Clubs. 


Want to get in on the action? Just follow our easy guide to download the FC Mobile 25 Beta on your phone.


How to download FC Mobile 25 Beta on Android?




Before we dive in, you should know that the beta version is only available in Malaysia, Singapore, and Canada. However, it is available globally to iOS users. So if you are in those regions, follow this step-by-step guide to download FC Mobile 25 Beta on Android:



Simply go to the Play Store and type EA Sports FC Mobile Limited Beta in the search bar.


Once you found the page, click on the install button to download FC Mobile 25 Beta.


If you can’t find the page, try this link.



How to download FC Mobile 25 Beta on iOS?


As mentioned before, you don’t have to worry about restrictions if you are an iOS user. Downloading the FC Mobile 25 Beta is very simple; follow these steps:



Start by downloading the TestFlight application from the App Store.


Now, click on the invitation link to go directly to TestFlight.


Click on the “Start Testing” button to install the FC Mobile 25 Beta.



Keep in mind that the invitation link is limited, so if you are late, you will miss the chance to try the beta version.


What is the beginning and the end date of FC Mobile 25 Beta?


FC Mobile 25 Beta is already available and will end on September 12, 2024 UTC.

The post How to download FC Mobile 25 Beta on Android and iOS appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to download FC Mobile 25 Beta on Android and iOS

articles.description:
Etsy seller Rocker Gaming has announced a new product for their line of retro accessories and modifications. This one is designed to keep an N64 analog stick safe during storage transportation. It’s a little too late for mine.


The N64 analog stick is a trash barge. I’ve had it with those damned things. They’re designed in such a way that they degrade with use and eventually either go completely limp or irrevocably stiff, and I am certain there is a dick joke in there. Back in the ‘90s, if you visited a Blockbuster Video, there was a good chance you’d get to experience a limp stick, but there was also a good chance your home already had one. My family went through quite a few N64 controllers. They were the stick drift of their day.


This wasn’t from transportation or storage either, whic…

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Like many early access periods, Black Ops 6 beta is reasonably limited in various specs. One, in particular, is the level cap, which won't be as substantial as the official version. So, if you want to know about its restrictions, here's the max level cap in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta. 


Black Ops 6 beta max level cap, explained


The max level cap for Black Ops 6 beta Weekend One is Level 20. You'll be able to reach this tier by completing Daily Challenges and earning enough XP from the various modes. In return, you'll unlock all the Custom Loadout features, at least for the first weekend.


Level 4 proves to be the most crucial rank out of all of them, considering that it unlocks the customizable loadouts. Fortunately, you'll obtain a few pre-made builds by Level 1 to get you through the early matches. Beta rewards will also be available, ending with the Squish Westpoint Operator Skin.


Screenshot by Destructoid


If you haven't pre-ordered Black Ops 6, you can tune into Weekend Two, which doesn't require a pre-order status. The max level cap raises to Level 30 at this point, bringing more rewards to your arsenal. Unlock gear such as the Combat Axe, Tac Mask Perk, and Chopper Gunner Scorestreak to get easy kills. The last tier earns you the Bug Smasher Weapon Blueprint, designed for the XM4 Assault Rifle.


Get ready for a much higher level cap once the Black Ops 6's beta period concludes. The updated Prestige systems will undoubtedly change up this feature, starting at the maximum Level 55. Although Prestige won't be available for the beta, you can use this time to hone your craft for the official launch.

The post What is the max level cap in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: What is the max level cap in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 beta?

Screenshot by Destructoid


How does Sabacc work in Star Wars Outlaws?

Credits are the primary in-game currency that serves as the medium for maneuvering through the galaxy's crime syndicates. While some methods are sure-shot ways of earning them, others require a little bit of risk-taking.


As you progress through the story, there will be instances when you'd want, or rather need, to upgrade your Speeder or Trailblazer, Kay's abilities, and a lot more. This is where having more Credits comes in handy. So, how do you earn these resources fast? Let's take a look.


Best ways to earn Credits f…
articles.title: How to get Credits fast in Star Wars Outlaws

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Despite malware having an even worse reputation than piracy, until now police operations to take sites down, explicitly because they're involved in both, have been pretty much non-existent. This week, music industry group IFPI revealed Operation Redirect, "the first operation of its kind in Brazil to target illegal sites associated with malware distribution." Intrigued by the announcement, we took a closer look and found plenty of drama.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation Redirect: Police Anti-Malware Action Protects Music & Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Fmovies, one of the most popular pirate streaming sites of recent times, disappeared a few weeks ago. No credit was taken by authorities or rightsholders, not even when related giants including AniWave fell this week. Today, initial suspicions are confirmed; anti-piracy group ACE says it assisted Vietnamese authorities to shut down the piracy ring. In parallel, the Vietnamese Government is organizing a promo tour in Hollywood.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies Piracy Ring Was Shut Down by Vietnam, Assisted By ACE

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit, filed in June by the world's largest educational publishers, accused Google of promoting pirate sites and profiting from piracy, among other things. This week Google responded to the Cengage Learning-led complaint with a motion to dismiss all but one of the publishers' claims, describing them as "tacked on" as part of a "kitchen-sink pleading strategy."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Asks Court to Gut “Kitchen Sink” Lawsuit Claiming it Profits From Piracy

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Fmovies was once the world's most popular pirate streaming site. Then mid-June, after years of smooth sailing, it vanished into thin air. Sites with over a billion annual visits tend not to throw everything away so easily. Yet last night, a site with close to two billion visits disappeared in similar circumstances, rapidly followed by another, and then many others after that. In the absence of an official announcement, earlier today we took an early sift through the wreckage.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Sites, Billions of Visits, Wiped Out in Hours: Sifting the Fmovies Wreckage

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Inside Out 2' tops the chart, followed by 'Longlegs'. 'Twisters' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 08/26/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After the recent shutdown of Fmovies, right now an entire streaming empire is collapsing. Big name casualties include Fboxz.to, Aniwave.to, Anix.to, AnimeSuge, Zoroxtv, the list goes on. In a message displayed on their homepages, visitors are advised to use legal options from now on. The exact same message appeared when 123movies threw in the towel a few years ago. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Streaming Giants Fboxz, AniWave, Zoroxtv & Others Dead in Major Collapse

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Claims that Italy will launch Piracy Shield 2.0 at the end of the year appear to be overly optimistic. With just four months left of 2024, a software supplier hasn't even been chosen yet. With the current system falling over, previously blocked domains and IP addresses are being unblocked to make room for new ones, something that the law has no provision for. Meanwhile, smart TV manufacturers will soon be asked to ban a VPN app from their sets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield 2.0 in Doubt For 2024 , TV Manufacturers Urged to Ban VPN

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Do you know someone who sells dodgy streaming boxes or pirate IPTV streams? In Ireland, anti-piracy group FACT in partnership with Crimestoppers would like you to 'report' this activity. These 'snitch' initiatives are not widely embraced by the public but with a six-week social media push, the campaign aims to identity new enforcement targets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pssst… Want to Snitch on Sellers of Pirate Streaming Services?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
"House of the Dragon" is one of the most watched TV series, particularly among pirates. The second season ended earlier this month after the eighth episode, though many fans had hoped for more. Pirates who downloaded the unexpected 'House of the Dragon S02E09' release got a surprise bonus, but not the one they were hoping for. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Bonus’ Episode of ‘House of the Dragon’ Comes With a Nasty Surprise for Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular pirate streaming site Fmovies shut down this summer, with several sister sites following suit. These sites were redirected to new streaming portals, purportedly operated by different individuals. This caught the attention of anti-piracy group ACE, which obtained a DMCA subpoena this week to unmask the people behind these new sites.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Goes After Fmovies Sister Site ‘Successors’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Taiwan's Criminal Investigation Bureau (CIB) has carried out a successful raid against a pirate IPTV provider that had been capturing broadcasters' content for at least two years. Authorities say the operation was hidden in a house with an outward appearance of being abandoned years ago. Among 279 items seized were 72 set-top boxes, 72 video encoders, servers, networking hardware, bank books, and mobile phones.  Two suspects were arrested.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Raid: 150+ Encoders, STBs, and Servers Seized, Operators Arrested

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In Germany, several large Internet service providers are blocking notorious pirate sites. These actions are the result of a voluntary agreement with rightsholders, under which the affected domain names can't be named. A 17-year-old student isn't keen on this secrecy and, together with some friends, has released a dedicated portal exposing all blocked domains to the public.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: 17-Year-old Student Exposes Germany’s ‘Secret’ Pirate Site Blocklist

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Offering movies and TV shows at no cost to the consumer has seen 'FAST' services like Pluto TV attract tens of millions of users. Consumption is also thriving via unofficial methods, including M3U8 playlists that are versatile despite their simplicity. During the past 24 hours, the most popular unofficial playlists were taken offline by Warner Bros, succeeding where earlier attempts failed.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Unofficial M3U8 Playlists For Pluto TV, Samsung & Plex, Shut Down By Warner

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In June, Webtoon Entertainment celebrated going public by sounding the closing bell at the Nasdaq exchange. Thus far, early investors haven't been rewarded, but the company itself sees a bright future ahead. By targeting roughly 170 pirate site domains though a DMCA subpoena, it hopes to unmask their rogue operators and clear the path for future growth.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Webtoon Targets 170+ Pirate Domains Through DMCA Subpoena

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Kakao Entertainment's pursuit of pirates distributing the company's 'webtoon' comics has been controversial at times, yet appears to be delivering results. Earlier this year the company's P.Cok anti-piracy unit offered rewards for webtoon fans to snitch on pirates. With the release of Kakao's fifth anti-piracy report, the company details its successes and reveals legal action targeting three major manga sites.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Kakao Reveals Anti-Piracy Successes, Legal Action Against Major Manga Sites

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
This November, The Pirate Bay will make its debut as a TV series on Swedish public television. The dramatized version of the site's history will be a trip down memory lane for those who followed the site closely over the years. This includes the 'classic' responses to legal threats, one of which features prominently in a just-launched teaser.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: “The Pirate Bay” TV Series Teaser Appears Online

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Bypass Paywalls Clean, a popular browser extension that allows users to view subscription websites without a subscription, has been shut down along with 3,879 forks. In a takedown notice filed at GitHub, News Media Alliance, which represents 2,200 news, magazine, and digital media publishers, explains that BPC violates its members rights under the DMCA's anti-circumvention provisions.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bypass Paywalls Clean Shut Down For DMCA Anti-Circumvention Violations

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Creative Content Australia has new anti-piracy campaign underway alongside the release of its annual Piracy Behaviors and Attitudes survey. In line with current anti-piracy trends, the group hopes to draw attention to the downsides of using pirate sites. "More than two million Australians who admit to visiting illegal streaming sites or pirate sites say they’ve experienced a form of online crime." Let's take a closer look.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Aussie Piracy Survey: ‘Poor Picture’ & ‘Slow Device’ = Cybersecurity Issues

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
U.S. law enforcement authorities appear to have seized several domain names of live sports streaming site Streameast, which is particularly popular in America. A seizure banner accuses the operation of criminal activity and warns of prison sentences. Nevertheless, the site's operators have already made a restart and are vowing to keep going until sports streams are affordable for everyone.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Feds Seize Domain Names of Sports Streaming Site Streameast

Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.

articles.description:
Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 5 is now available in the Canary channel.
If you already have an Android Studio build on the Canary channel,
you can get the update by clicking Help > Check for Updates (or Android Studio > Check
for Updates on macOS). Otherwise, you can download it here.
For information on new features and changes in Android Studio Ladybug, see the Android Studio Preview release notes.

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug, see
closed issues.
General fixes and features
Below is a list of general fixes in Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Canary 5 and Android Gradle Plugin 8.7.0-alpha05. These are a result of your bug
reports, which help us to make Android Studio better. If you encounter a problem, let us know by reporting a bug. You can also vote for an existing issue to indicate that it also affects
you.
